title: Landing Page Development - Basic (No-Code Tools)
features: Includes a single-page layout using no-code tools
Responsive design adapted for all devices

title: Landing Page Development - Premium (Custom Code)
features: Includes a single-page layout with prereferred framework
Responsive design adapted for all devices

title: Content Management System (CMS) - Standard (No-Code Tools)
features: Basic CMS functionalities using platforms like WordPress or Webflow

title: Content Management System (CMS) - Premium (Custom Code)
features: Custom-coded CMS features tailored to specific needs

title: E-commerce Development - Basic (No-Code Tools)
features: Setup using platforms like Shopify or BigCommerce for example
Includes basic e-commerce functionalities like product listing, cart, and checkout

title: E-commerce Development - Advanced (Custom Code)
features: Advanced product filtering and search capabilities

title: Mobile App or Desktop Software
features: Native or hybrid app development for iOS and/or Android
Basic features like user registration and profile management
Turnaround time varies based on complexity (minimum 1 month)

title: Platform as a Service (PaaS)
features: Includes initial setup, deployment, and basic training
Ongoing support available at additional costs

title: Software as a Service (SaaS)
features: Development of a SaaS application tailored to client specifications
Basic features include user management, data security, and initial API integrations

title: Hourly Rate
features: Best for small tasks or when the client needs work on an ad-hoc basis
Ideal for troubleshooting, minor updates, or consultations
